name: Enspelled Armor (Cantrip)
description: Bound into this armor is a cantrip. The cantrip is determined when the armor is created and must belong to the Abjuration or Illusion school of magic. The armor has 6 charges and regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the armor, you can expend 1 charge to cast its spell.The spell's saving throw DC is 13, and its attack bonus is +5. Base items. This item variant can be applied to the following base items:Breastplate (Enspelled (Cantrip) Breastplate)Chain Mail (Enspelled (Cantrip) Chain Mail)Chain Shirt (Enspelled (Cantrip) Chain Shirt)Half Plate Armor (Enspelled (Cantrip) Half Plate Armor)Hide Armor (Enspelled (Cantrip) Hide Armor)Leather Armor (Enspelled (Cantrip) Leather Armor)Padded Armor (Enspelled (Cantrip) Padded Armor)Plate Armor (Enspelled (Cantrip) Plate Armor)Ring Mail (Enspelled (Cantrip) Ring Mail)Scale Mail (Enspelled (Cantrip) Scale Mail)Splint Armor (Enspelled (Cantrip) Splint Armor)Studded Leather Armor (Enspelled (Cantrip) Studded Leather Armor)

name: Büyülü (Temel) Göğüslük
description: Bound into this armor is a cantrip. The cantrip is determined when the armor is created and must belong to the Abjuration or Illusion school of magic. The armor has 6 charges and regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the armor, you can expend 1 charge to cast its spell.The spell's saving throw DC is 13, and its attack bonus is +5.

name: Büyülü (Temel) Zincir Zırh
description: Bound into this armor is a cantrip. The cantrip is determined when the armor is created and must belong to the Abjuration or Illusion school of magic. The armor has 6 charges and regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the armor, you can expend 1 charge to cast its spell.The spell's saving throw DC is 13, and its attack bonus is +5.The wearer has Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 13, their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

While wearing the armor, you can expend 1 charge to cast its spell.The spell's saving throw DC is 18, and its attack bonus is +10.The wearer has Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

name: Büyülü (. Seviye 8) Şeritli Zırh
description: Bound into this armor is a level 8 spell. The spell is determined when the armor is created and must belong to the Abjuration or Illusion school of magic. The armor has 6 charges and regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the armor, you can expend 1 charge to cast its spell.The spell's saving throw DC is 18, and its attack bonus is +10.The wearer has Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 15, their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

name: Büyülü (. Seviye 8) Çivili Deri Zırh
description: Bound into this armor is a level 8 spell. The spell is determined when the armor is created and must belong to the Abjuration or Illusion school of magic. The armor has 6 charges and regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the armor, you can expend 1 charge to cast its spell.The spell's saving throw DC is 18, and its attack bonus is +10.
